channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024080552
item.description:
Report X-2024080552

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The package was found on its end of the package with a corrosive label on the opposite side of the package. The weight of the one of the bottles of Aluminum Safe Machine detergent to become pressed onto the other bottle causing the liquid contents to leak through the failed bottle seal and cover threads resulting in the liquid leaking out the end of the package contaminating the other bottle.

item.title: Report X-2024080284
item.description:
Report X-2024080284

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-04
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box has no markings on it. The box contains 3X1gal bottles of Zep Mold Stain & Mildew Stain Remover. The side of the box is wet and ripped open from the leaking 2X1gal bottles of Zep stain remover. The 2 bottles have broken caps, the last bottle is soiled from leakage. This is an Undeclared hazmat.

item.title: Report X-2024080278
item.description:
Report X-2024080278

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-04
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box is marked with a flammable liquid diamond. The box contains a 1X5gal metal pail of Foundation Armor SX5000. The top of the box is wet from the leaking 1X5gal pail. The closure on the pail is dented causing it to leak.

item.title: Report X-2024080056
item.description:
Report X-2024080056

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-31
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box is marked with a corrosive diamond. The box contains 4X1gal bottles of Advantage Chemicals Oven & Grill Cleaner. The box fell while it was being unloaded causing the cap to come off and leak. The other bottles are damaged from the leakage. The was also unprocessed because it was damaged before HAP could be done.

item.title: Report X-2024080314
item.description:
Report X-2024080314

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-08T15:13:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-05
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg missing required Hazmat PRP Certification. Class 9 diamond is covered/obscured. Pkg contains one motor vehicle air bag dropped off at a FedEx Express location by an automotive dealership for manufacturer's recall. Pkg picked up by station and forwarded to the next load point without proper handling of the pkg.
